トピック.授業計画1:
This class will have a lecture/workshop format. It will be online using Zoom. Students will be expected to participate in each class prepared and to actively take part in all class work. The schedule for this class is as follows.

Week and Topic
1. Introduction
2. Social dimensions of language
3. Diglossia and Code-switching
4. Linguistic varieties
5. Pidgins and Creoles
6. Presentations
7. Language shift and death
8. British and American English
9. Regional dialects
10.Presentations
11.Language and Gender
12.Language and Gender
13.Language and Culture
14.Final Presentation
トピック.授業外学習2: There will be homework assignments for every class. Students will need to prepare for the required weekly assignments.
